summary: Frontend testing completed for screenshot banner overlap fix and Google Drive Backup UI. All critical features working correctly.

issues:
HTML nesting warning: AlertDialogDescription renders as

tag with nested

and

elements causing hydration warnings. Should use asChild prop or change AlertDialogDescription content to inline elements only.

action_items: OPTIONAL: Fix HTML nesting in Settings.js AlertDialogDescription - use asChild prop or replace nested block elements with spans
critical_code_review_comments:
Settings.js line 322-370: AlertDialogDescription contains nested
and

elements which causes HTML validation warnings. Radix AlertDialogDescription renders as

by default. Consider using asChild prop with a

or refactoring content to use inline elements.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All main features working correctly. Screenshot banner no longer overlaps message input. Google Drive Backup UI is functional with Create Backup and Restore dialogs working. The Google OAuth flow cannot be fully automated but UI elements are present and clickable. Minor HTML nesting warning in Settings.js can be fixed but doesn't affect functionality.

screenshot_banner_overlap_fix.details: Message input is fully accessible at y=992 with banner at y=1044. Input bottom (1028) is above visible viewport height (1080). User can click and type in message input without obstruction.

settings_page_loads.details: Settings page loads correctly showing: Account Information, Security section (End-to-end encryption: Active, Encryption keys: Generated), Google Drive Backup section, Danger Zone

create_backup_dialog.details: Dialog opens with: Zero-Knowledge Encryption explanation, Backup Password (min 12 characters) input, Confirm Password input, Warning text, Cancel and Create Backup buttons

restore_backup_button.details: Button is visible and clickable. Opens Restore from Backup dialog with loading spinner. Google Identity Services initialized successfully. Cannot test full OAuth flow in automation.

message_input_accessibility.details: On desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (390x844), message input is fully visible above screenshot banner. Successfully typed test message in input field.

chat_layout_with_banner.details: Banner shows at fixed bottom:0, #root height adjusted to calc(100% - 36px). Chat dashboard uses h-full. Layout correctly accommodates banner without overlapping chat content.

mobile_responsive.details: Mobile viewport (390x844) shows dashboard correctly. Message input position: top=756, bottom=792 - fully visible. Screenshot banner visible at bottom.

console_warnings.message: WebSocket connection closed before established - expected in preview environment
